mapper.update: update `item` set name = #{name}, content = #{content}, item_img_url = #{item_img_url}, price = #{price}, discount = #{discount}, point = #{point} where item_idx = #{item_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( item_code, user_idx, name, category, content, item_img_url, company, price, discount, point, created_date ) VALUES ( #{item_code}, #{user_idx}, #{name}, #{category}, #{content}, #{item_img_url}, #{company}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{point}, NOW() )
